Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Comedy
Status: New Series
Network: TV3 ( New Zealand)
Airs: Fridays at 08:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: February 08, 2013

Cheerful slacker Deano (Tammy Davis, "Outrageous Fortune") and uptight city guy Oscar (Oliver Driver, "Sunrise", "The Almighty Johnsons") discover they are brothers when, much to their surprise, they both inherit a holiday camp from their estranged and recently dead father, Gary Wilde. Dad had one stipulation: these two have to run the camping ground together or they lose it - they can only sell it if they both agree. It’s Dad’s way of bringing his family together, even if it’s after he’s dead.
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-34386)
